item.title: Secure DDNS - Namecheap SSL With DDClient
item.description: https://ddclient.net A quote short post on how to secure your DDNS updates with Namecheap, SSL and DDClient. For those of us who use dynamic DNS to work around roaming IP addresses, it is important to make sure that you are updating your DNS records securely with SSL.
